response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to purchase this product from us at a special price of $1,400,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value, making it a highly attractive proposition for you. I believe this opportunity aligns well with your interests and financial goals. Should you decide to proceed, we would be more than happy to facilitate the transaction promptly. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1400000}
